name: fra-atlas-webgis
description: AI-Powered FRA Atlas & WebGIS Decision Support System for Ministry of Tribal Affairs

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.dev:win: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "timeout /t 5 && cd client && npm start"
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Building client...' && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && echo 'Build complete!'

author: Ministry of Tribal Affairs - Digital India
